text.title: part14_BDSM as business: Interviews with Dominatrixes
text.p:
Jada :
The Secretary
.
The Secretary
was literally true to form , two people finding each other .
It goes so much more deeper than S&M .
Maggie Gyllenhaal
was great in that , it was just a fantastic movie .
A lot of people can relate to it where it ’s just this random occurrence where two people meet and they have this connection , and it becomes much more than BDSM .

hi.s:
One of my favorites –
David Lynch
.

text.p:
Veronica :
Yeah !
The scene where she is submitting him .

Veronica :
Yeah .
Any film where there is a power dynamic , people will sexualize it .

hi.s: DS : What ’s a mainstream movie that turns you on ?

text.p:
Veronica :
Dangerous Liaisons
!

Veronica :

Laughs
]

hi.s: DS : What about some BDSM films ?

text.p:
Jada :
Harmony Productions
– these are production companies .

Veronica :
Kink.com

Jada :
Savage Productions , which is more into the pain aspect .
These are ones that are really into it .
Julie Simone with Harmony .
Den of Inequity was making their own movies for awhile .

Veronica :
Hell yeah !
But I have n’t done any .

p.s: When I was first started I was very nervous and scared because it is something that is out there and anybody will be able to obtain .
That ’s one thing when you are first starting out you have to be aware of , is not rushing into everything right away and then you realize it is something you do n’t enjoy .

hi.s: DS : And then you ’re running for Congress ten years later !

text.p:
Jada :
Exactly ! [
Laughs
]

Veronica :
[
Laughs
]

Jada :
First Lady
, hey !

hi.s: “ Oh , shit , I forgot about that ! ”

text.p:
Jada :
Completely forgot about that one right there !

Veronica :
Different Loving
– he explores psychology .

Jada :
Carrie ’s Story
.
That ’s another .

hi.s: DS : Are there certain celebrities people have BDSM fantasies about and they want to incorporate them into the session ?

text.p:
Veronica :
I get told I look like people .
But no .

Jada :
No.

p.s:
You try not to get
too
personal with people .

hi.s: DS : Do you all network amongst yourselves ?

text.p:
Veronica :
Yeah , we call each other up .

Jada :
A lot of the Mistresses are well-connected with a lot of the other dungeons .
So a lot of times we ’ll tell each other .

hi.s: DS : Do you all hang out ?

text.p:
Veronica :
Yeah , at fetish parties and we go out together .

p.s: You end up seeing each other and know each other .

hi.s: DS : Are there certain clubs where you all hang out ?

text.p:
Jada :
Paddles .

Veronica :
What is the place on Clinton and Delancey ?
There ’s a once-a-month fetish party .
That ’s one of them .
Otto ’s ; a lot of Mistresses hang out at Otto ’s for some reason .
